name: Blue-Eyed Thief
overview: A text adventure game published as a type-in game in the book "Castles & Kingdoms". A young adventurer buys a mysterious brass helmet from a costume shop. Suddenly he is plunged into a wild and dangerous world of thieves and creatures and impossible puzzles to be solved. You and your Commodore 64 are all that stands between this lad and certain destruction! Your main task is to steal a legendary object from the Master Thief himself. Can you enter this world and escape again alive?
